titleStmt.title: Natvral and morall questions and answers. Intermingled with many prettie and pleasant riddles, and darke sentences / written by A.P. ; with a manner of ordering the body for health through euery month of the yeare, and for dieting it for a seuen-night after blood-letting. Written in Latin verse by Ioachimus Camerarius.
titleStmt.author: A. P.
Camerarius, Joachim, 1534-1598 Victvs et cultvs ratio.

notesStmt.note: "Victvs et cvltvs ratio exposita quatuor in singulos menses versibus, per Ioachimum Camerarium" at end p. 135-138.
Ornament on t.p. ; headpieces ; tailpieces ; initials.
Imperfect: pages torn and have print show-through, error in register.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
